Power usage is mostly the same.  For each 0.25L of water used in the canning process, add one of this, plus another of this for each 15 minutes the canning occurs, plus another of this if you are canning meat (needs higher temp)
so to make a 0.5L jar of canned meat, would be 11u of water for 30 minutes, + meat tax = 44u of this total.  Canning ain't cheap!
